casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Travis BOYS NO. 2018-KK-0404 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 13, 2018

Denied.

GUIDRY, J., would grant a stay and docket for full briefing, argument and opinion.

CRICHTON, J., would grant a stay and docket for full briefing, argument and opinion.

GENOVESE, J., would grant a stay and docket for full briefing, argument and opinion.
